name: Boom! Maze
description: Blast your way through a maze in an arcade version of the classic bomberman. Play through procedurally generated levels and destroy all the enemies.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: windows 7 Processor: intel i5-4590 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
